video.title: Marvel's Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H.
video.synopsis: Marvel's mightiest superheroes -- Hulk, She-Hulk, Red Hulk, A-Bomb and Skaar -- team up to tackle threats too enormous for other heroes to handle.

episodes.synopsis: Rick Jones begins making a web-series to show the world that Hulk is a hero, and when Annihilus invades Earth, Hulk gets to prove it.
episodes.title: Doorway to Destruction: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: The newly formed Agents of S.M.A.S.H. invade the Negative Zone to stop supervillain Annihilus once and for all.
episodes.title: Doorway to Destruction: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: When the Leader hijacks Iron Man's Hulkbuster suits to destroy the Agents of S.M.A.S.H., the team and Iron Man must work together to defeat him.
episodes.title: Hulk-Busted

episodes.synopsis: After the Collector captures every last hero on Earth, Hulk and Spider-Man are the only ones left to save the planet from destruction.
episodes.title: The Collector

episodes.synopsis: The Agents of S.M.A.S.H. face their biggest foe yet when they travel into space to battle Ego, The Living Planet, who threatens to tear Earth apart.
episodes.title: All About Ego

episodes.synopsis: A-Bomb is eager to prove himself to an over-protective Hulk and finds an unlikely mentor in Red, but they must face Sauron and his army of dinosaurs.
episodes.title: Savage Land

episodes.synopsis: On A-Bomb's birthday, the Hulks are miniaturized by the Leader, but still must stop him from shrinking every city on Earth.
episodes.title: Incredible Shrinking Hulks

episodes.synopsis: The Hulks join forces with Thor to stop Laufey and his army of frost giants from freezing the world solid.
episodes.title: Hulks On Ice

episodes.synopsis: Believing his presence in Vista Verde is putting its citizens in danger, Hulk goes underground and becomes savior to the Moloids.
episodes.title: Of Moles and Men

episodes.synopsis: When the curse of the Wendigo infects the team, the Hulks fight their way out of a real live horror movie, starting with Hulk's old rival Wolverine.
episodes.title: Wendigo Apocalypse

episodes.synopsis: Skaar gets a civility lesson from Doc Sampson while the Hulks battle Absorbing Man, who takes on Gamma Energy to become an unstoppable force.
episodes.title: The Skaar Whisperer

episodes.synopsis: Hulk begrudgingly teams up with The Thing to take the fight to the Leader's doorstep when the supervillain threatens the Agents of S.M.A.S.H.
episodes.title: Into the Negative Zone

episodes.synopsis: When an irritated Red Hulk accidentally drops Devil Dinosaur in Dr. Doom's backyard, the mad dictator launches a major assault on the Hulks.
episodes.title: Red Rover

episodes.synopsis: Hulk has to save the day when his friends are possessed by Venom and rampage through New York City to destroy Spider-Man.
episodes.title: The Venom Inside

episodes.synopsis: While the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. are in Las Vegas, Galactus comes to Earth looking for a new herald and settles on the under-appreciated She-Hulk.
episodes.title: Galactus Goes Green

episodes.synopsis: The Hulks have crashed their Jump Jet far too many times and now that the Leader has given it artificial intelligence, it's out for revenge.
episodes.title: A Thing About Machines

episodes.synopsis: A villain from Red Hulk's past takes out the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. one-by-one to exact revenge and frame the team for destroying Vista Verde.
episodes.title: Abomination

episodes.synopsis: Impossible Man, the Hulks' biggest fan, proves to be their biggest problem when he summons the giant dragon Fing Fang Foom to battle them.
episodes.title: Mission Impossible Man

episodes.synopsis: When Skaar accidentally incites the ire of Asgard, the Hulks must stop Malekith the Accursed and his Dark Elves from destroying the Nine Realms.
episodes.title: For Asgard

episodes.synopsis: When Hulk puts A-Bomb under the tutelage of the Sorcerer Supreme, Dr. Strange, A-Bomb not only gets a lesson in hard work, but also has to save Earth.
episodes.title: Stranger In a Strange Land

episodes.synopsis: When the Hulks thwart Deathlok from attacking a girl in the mall, they inadvertently start a devastating Skrull invasion.
episodes.title: Deathlok

episodes.synopsis: A-Bomb's crush on a mysterious girl leads the Hulks to the secret home of the Inhumans, an isolationist race with plans to wipe out mankind.
episodes.title: Inhuman Nature

episodes.synopsis: Annoyed with his fellow Hulks, Hulk seeks some alone time and lands on an island where he inherits a family that's far more troublesome than his own.
episodes.title: The Hunted

episodes.synopsis: The world finally accepts the Hulks as heroes, but a surprise attack by The Leader threatens to destroy Vista Verde - and their new reputation.
episodes.title: Monsters No More

episodes.synopsis: The Agents of S.M.A.S.H. get transported to Skaar's home planet, where they must stop The Leader from taking control of the planet and themselves.
episodes.title: Planet Leader

episodes.synopsis: To save the universe, the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. and the Guardians of the Galaxy must break free of a simulated paradise created by The Collector.
episodes.title: It's a Wonderful Smash

episodes.synopsis: The agents must do battle with Ronan the Accuser and his Kree soldiers in order to save an old foe -- Ego the Living Planet.
episodes.title: Planet Hulk: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Galactus comes to consume Ego the Living Planet, the agents must put themselves at risk to save the lives of their two enemies.
episodes.title: Planet Hulk: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween, the agents work with the Howling Commandos to prevent Dormammu from invading and turning humanity into Mindless Ones.
episodes.title: Hulking Commandos

episodes.synopsis: In order to stop the Null from crossing through a wormhole to wreak ruin upon Earth, each of the Hulks must face his greatest fear.
episodes.title: Fear Itself

episodes.synopsis: The agents of S.M.A.S.H. team up with the Guardians of the Galaxy to stop the Skrulls from using Hulk gamma powers to create super-Skrulls.
episodes.title: Guardians of the Galaxy

episodes.synopsis: The Hulks return to Earth only to find that they are centuries too late. Humans have devolved into primitive beasts, and the Hulks are devolving, too.
episodes.title: Future Shock

episodes.synopsis: Despite Hulk's warnings, A-Bomb brings a cute alien aboard the ship and tries to cover up his misdeed when the alien starts to multiply and take over.
episodes.title: A Druff Is Enough

episodes.synopsis: The team returns to Earth to face charges of destroying Vista Verde and clear its name, but finds the town under the rule of an abominable general.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: When the Leader blows Devil Dinosaur up to gigantic proportions and lets him loose on New York City, Spider-Man and the agents must save the day.
episodes.title: Spidey, I Blew Up the Dinosaur

episodes.synopsis: The agents battle Xemnu in the championship arena. If they win, they get Xemnu's victory belt, and if they lose, Xemnu destroys Earth!
episodes.title: The Strongest One There Is

episodes.synopsis: When Abomination frames the Hulks for attacking the SHIELD Tri-Carrier, they must face evil gamma-powered doppelgangers in order to save Nick Fury.
episodes.title: The Dopplesmashers

episodes.synopsis: Abomination confines the Hulks in the same super-villain prison where many of their enemies reside. Can the Hulks escape and prove their innocence?
episodes.title: The Big Green Mile

episodes.synopsis: The agents track the Leader to a deserted island but get stuck in a deadly maze where they must battle the Hulk's dark side -- in physical form.
episodes.title: The Green Room

episodes.synopsis: Hulk reluctantly fills in as mayor of Vista Verde, while Red and Skaar leave the team to start their own webcast as super-villain bounty hunters.
episodes.title: The Defiant Hulks

episodes.synopsis: While saving Earth from a catastrophic meteor event, the Hulks encounter a future version of Hulk who might not be the hero they think he is.
episodes.title: Enter, the Maestro

episodes.synopsis: The Hulks team up with Hercules in ancient Greece to stop Pluto, who has stolen Minerva's shield, from turning everyone on Earth to stone.
episodes.title: The Tale of Hercules

episodes.synopsis: Hulk allows himself to be turned back into Bruce Banner, but then struggles with his decision when Ronan launches an alien attack.
episodes.title: Banner Day

episodes.synopsis: The Hulks try to help Iron Man beat Mainframe in a gladiatorial roller derby game for the fate of Earth, but only one of them knows how to skate.
episodes.title: Wheels of Fury

episodes.synopsis: When Hulk chases Leader back in time, their actions result in modern Earth being overtaken by dinosaurs. Hulk must battle Leader to save all of time.
episodes.title: Days of Future Smash: Part 1: The Dino Era

episodes.synopsis: Hulk goes back to the time of the Vikings, teaming with young Thor and Loki and the S.M.A.S.H. agents to stop Leader from achieving world domination.
episodes.title: Days of Future Smash: Part 2: Smashguard

episodes.synopsis: Hulk pursues Leader back to the Victorian era and creates an alliance against Dracula, who wants to shroud the Earth with Leader's gamma cloud.
episodes.title: Days of Future Smash: Part 3: Dracula

episodes.synopsis: Chasing Leader back to World War II, Hulk teams with Captain America to stop Red Skull; in the present, S.M.A.S.H. must free the world from HYDRA.
episodes.title: Days of Future Smash: Part 4: Year of the Hydra

episodes.synopsis: Finally catching up to Leader in the present, Hulk rejoins the agents of S.M.A.S.H. but is suddenly whisked into the future to battle a Leader threat.
episodes.title: Days of Future Smash: Part 5: The Tomorrow Smashers

episodes.synopsis: While escorting Abomination to his court trial, the Hulks run into Ghost Rider, who plans to make both Abomination and Red atone for their crimes.
episodes.title: Spirit of Vengeance

episodes.synopsis: When a Kree armada, led by the Supreme Intelligence, invades, Hulk's allegiance is torn between his two teams, who must join forces to save Earth.
episodes.title: Planet Monster Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The agents team up with the Avengers to free Hulk from the clutches of the Super Intelligence and prevent the destruction of Earth.
episodes.title: Planet Monster Part 2
